alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:37PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Uintah County through 415 PM MDT... At 337 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Myton, or 16 miles south of Fort Duchesne, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Uintah County, including the following locations... Randlett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
